title: Always With You
overview: The strong woman Li Na was originally the female boss of a cosmetics company, but her son Ding Yiyi, who was studying in Canada, was in constant condition, so she had to give up her job, and even disregarded the strong opposition of her husband Ding Zhiyuan, and chose to go to Canada to become a full-time employee.' accompany my mother.' However, behind the sacrifice of work and family, there are various realities such as the company's betrayal by subordinates, separation in different places, and emotional discord with her husband. Just when she was desperate, Li Na met Hu Yuanyuan, Xia Xia and Chen Lili, who were also accompanying mothers. They supported and depended on each other in their lives, and finally found a way to get along with her husband and children, and reached a life, love, and family relationship. reconciliation and growth.
